name.baseName: Aluminum electrolytic capacitor production ; components before assembly ; soaking method ; components before soaking
铝电解电容器生产 ; 装配前的元件 ; 浸泡法 ; 浸泡前的元件

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 浸泡法生产铝电解电容器（AEC） ; 420V 680uf

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The investigated manufacturer produced about 1.183 billion AECs of all kinds in 2020.

technology.technologicalApplicability: Aluminum electrolytic capacitors (AECs) produced using the soaking method are typically used in electronic devices for filtering, coupling and uncoupling signals, and energy storage. Such capacitors, with a specification of 420V 680uF, are commonly employed in power supplies, inverters, and other high voltage electronic applications.
采用浸泡法生产的铝电解电容器（AEC）通常用于电子设备中的过滤、耦合和解耦信号以及能量存储。这种具有420V 680uF规格的电容器通常用于电源、逆变器和其他高压电子应用中。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The inventory data of capacitor production come from the AECs’ production factory in Jiangsu Province, China. The cut-off criteria of LCI data collection for each process is coverage of at least 95% of the mass and energy of the input and output flows. The inventory data of anode foil production and cathode foil production is obtained based on the analysis of the manufacturing processes and corresponding process parameters. The upstream data (i.e., aluminum ingots, separator paper, transport, electricity, and water) are acquired from the Gabi software (Version: 10.6.1.35). In detail, the profile of Chineses electricity grid from the China Electric Power Yearbook adopts the reference year 2016. The reference year of aluminum ingot production is 2015. The inaccessible data about ammonium citrate, ammonium pentaborate, NH4H2PO4, and HBO3 are estimated based on chemical equations using the existing materials (reactants) in the Gabi software. The use and end-of-life stage inventory data are obtained based on analysis and calculation.

电容器生产的库存数据来自 AEC 位于中国江苏省的生产工厂。每道工序的 LCI 数据收集的截止标准是至少覆盖输入流和输出流 95% 的质量和能量。阳极箔生产和阴极箔生产的库存数据是根据生产工艺和相应工艺参数分析获得的。上游数据（即铝锭、分选纸、运输、电力和水）来自 Gabi 软件（版本：10.6.1.35）。具体而言，《中国电力年鉴》中的中国电网概况以 2016 年为基准年。铝锭生产的基准年为 2015 年。无法获取的柠檬酸铵、五硼酸铵、NH4H2PO4 和 HBO3 数据是根据 Gabi 软件中现有材料（反应物）的化学方程式估算的。使用和报废阶段的库存数据是通过分析和计算获得的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).
Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the inventory data of AEC production for Life Cycle Assessment, ensure to include all relevant mass and energy inputs and outputs. Coverage must be at least 95% to meet the cut-off criteria for LCI data collection. Appropriate allocation procedures should apply where necessary. The reference years for the input data of the Chinese electricity grid and aluminum ingots are 2016 and 2015, respectively. Due care should be taken when using estimated data for chemicals like ammonium citrate and ammonium pentaborate, ensuring it's aligned with the methodological guidance in the Gabi software. Additionally, this data set should be complemented with specific use phase behaviors and end-of-life scenarios relevant to the AECs in question, following I/O data analysis and calculation.

在使用铝电解电容器生产的清单数据进行生命周期评估时，确保包括所有相关的质量和能量输入与输出。LCI数据收集的截止标准是至少要覆盖95%。在必要时应用适当的分配程序。中国电网和铝锭的输入数据参考年分别为2016年和2015年。在使用估计数据（如柠檬酸铵和硼酸铵）时应该格外注意，确保它与Gabi软件中的方法论指导相符。此外，应根据AEC的特定使用阶段行为和末端生命期预想场景，补充这些数据集，遵循输入/输出数据分析和计算。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
